text: Welcome to the AudioPipeline demo! This system can convert text to speech using advanced AI voice providers.
The pipeline supports multiple voice providers including ElevenLabs and Hume.ai, with automatic fallback to Google TTS.
Each audio file is enhanced with random background ambient sounds like city noise, rain, or coffee shop ambiance.
The background audio is automatically balanced to be quieter than the speech, ensuring clear communication.
You can customize the background volume, disable background audio entirely, or process multiple JSON files at once.
This technology is perfect for creating engaging podcasts, audiobooks, or any content that benefits from ambient soundscapes.
The system automatically handles API rate limits, network errors, and missing dependencies with graceful fallbacks.
Thank you for exploring the AudioPipeline! We hope you enjoy the rich, professional-quality audio output.
